description.value: Astropath can re-roll Willpower tests they make due to results of Psychic Phenomena, and Perils of the Warp, as well as tests to avoid gaining Mutations, or to resist Daemonic Possession.

system.benefit: Astropath can re-roll Willpower tests they make due to results of Psychic Phenomena, and Perils of the Warp, as well as tests to avoid gaining Mutations, or to resist Daemonic Possession.

prerequisites.text: Tier 3: Astropath E.Adv, Strong Minded, Willpower 50.

specialAbilities.name: Soul Ward
specialAbilities.description: You can reroll Willpower tests made due to Psychic Phenomena and Perils of the Warp, as well as tests to avoid Mutations or resist Daemonic Possession.
